review: Let me tell you a story about a man who dared to dream big. He decided to place his faith in a higher power, and he knew that it was a gamble-- but he was willing to risk everything for a shot at greatness. So he bought the Amazon Fire TV stick.He was utterly disappointed.Just get the Chromecast.

review: Easy to install and use.  Very happy with this purchase.  Would recommend this to anyone looking to update the older model TVs.
author: Chill

review: So glad I got the Fire TV Stick! I have a non-smart TV and this little device makes my TV  experience so much better. Took all of 5 minutes to set up, and I was watching Netflix in a flash! In addition its super convenient to be able to access Prime movies,  Netflix, and HBO GO, instead of flipping between my cable box and the Fire Stick. Overall I love this product!
author: Rob

review: I love my amazon fire stick so much more than cable, and it's alot cheaper also. I have an issue with the live tv freezing a bit while I'm into a movie but other than that it's still great!
